TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed PackUriHelper extends System.Object
public ref class PackUriHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: Proporciona métodos de utilidad para crear y analizar objetos de URI de paquete.

span.span: Provides utility methods to compose and parse pack URI objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ComparePackUri (Uri firstPackUri, Uri secondPackUri);
.method public static hidebysig int32 ComparePackUri(class System.Uri firstPackUri, class System.Uri secondPackUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function ComparePackUri (firstPackUri As Uri, secondPackUri As Uri) As Integer
public: static int ComparePackUri(Uri ^ firstPackUri, Uri ^ secondPackUri);

param.name: firstPackUri
param.span: Primer Pack URI.

span.span: The first pack URI.

param.name: secondPackUri
param.span: Segundo Pack URI.

span.span: The second pack URI.

summary.span: Devuelve un valor que indica si dos Pack URI son equivalentes.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two pack URIs are equivalent.

returns.span: Un entero con signo que indica la relación entre y .

span.span: A signed integer indicating the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si ambos `firstPackUri` y `secondPackUri` son `null`, devuelve 0.If both `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are `null`, returns 0. Cuando se comparan pack URI, un URI nulo siempre es menor que un URI no nulo.When comparing pack URIs, a null URI is always less than a non-null URI. Para los casos donde `firstPackUri` y `secondPackUri` son ambos absoluta pack URI, realiza la comparación.For cases where `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are both absolute pack URIs, performs the comparison.

span.span: Either or is not an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
-or-

exception.span: o no comienzan con el esquema "pack://".

span.span: Either or do not begin with a "pack://" scheme.

summary.span: Devuelve un valor que indica si dos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] de parte de paquete son equivalentes.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two package part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] are equivalent.

returns.span: Un valor que indica la relación entre y .

span.span: A value that indicates the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si ambos `firstPartUri` y `secondPartUri` son `null`, devuelve 0.If both `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are `null`, returns 0. Al comparar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], un valor null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] siempre es menor que un valor no nulo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].When comparing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], a null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is always less than a non-null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]. Para los casos donde `firstPartUri` y `secondPartUri` son ambos relativa URI, realiza la comparación.For cases where `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are both relative URIs, performs the comparison.

exception.span: Las sintaxis de o de no se corresponden con sintaxis válidas para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de parte.

span.span: or is not a valid part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] syntax.

summary.span: Crea un nuevo URI de paquete.

span.span: Creates a new pack URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks En la tabla siguiente se muestra casos de ejemplo para el método.The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|Pack URI devueltoReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summarypack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xrefpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| Crear un URI de paquete es un proceso de varios pasos.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. Por ejemplo, es un paso en la creación de un pack URI reemplazar los caracteres de barra diagonal (/) de la `packageUri` con comas (,).For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). Para obtener más información sobre la conversión de cadena y cómo se forman pack URI, vea el apéndice A.4 "String Conversion Examples" y el apéndice B.3 "Redactar un Pack URI" en la especificación de Open Packaging Conventions disponible para su descarga en [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

param.span: URI del paquete al que se hace referencia.

span.span: The URI of the referenced .

summary.span: Crea un nuevo elemento Pack URI que apunta a un paquete.

span.span: Creates a new pack URI that points to a package.

returns.span: El elemento Pack URI del paquete al que hace referencia el elemento dado.

span.span: The pack URI for the referenced by the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` no se puede especificar como `null` o está vacío.`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. En la tabla siguiente se muestra casos de ejemplo de .The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packageUri`|Pack URI devueltoReturned pack URI| |------------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abcpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|Pack://file:,, d:,packages,mypackage2.pkgpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| Crear un URI de paquete es un proceso de varios pasos.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. Por ejemplo, es un paso en la creación de un pack URI reemplazar los caracteres de barra diagonal (/) de la `packageUri` con comas (,).For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). Para obtener más información sobre la conversión de cadena y cómo se forman pack URI, vea el apéndice A.4 "String Conversion Examples" y el apéndice B.3 "Redactar un Pack URI" en la especificación de Open Packaging Conventions disponible para su descarga en [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el método para definir un pack URI que hace referencia a un paquete.The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` no se puede especificar como nulo o vacío.`packageUri` may not be specified as null or empty. Si `partUri` es `null`, el URI de paquete devuelto apunta al paquete.If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. En la tabla siguiente se muestra casos de ejemplo para el método.The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|Pack URI devueltoReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| Crear un URI de paquete es un proceso de varios pasos.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. Por ejemplo, es un paso en la creación de un pack URI reemplazar los caracteres de barra diagonal (/) de la `packageUri` con comas (,).For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). Para obtener más información sobre la conversión de cadena y cómo se forman pack URI, vea el apéndice A.4 "String Conversion Examples" y el apéndice B.3 "Redactar un Pack URI" en la especificación de Open Packaging Conventions disponible para su descarga en [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el método para definir un pack URI que hace referencia a un paquete.The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri Create (Uri packageUri, Uri partUri, string fragment);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri Create(class System.Uri packageUri, class System.Uri partUri, string fragment) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (packageUri As Uri, partUri As Uri, fragment As String) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ Create(Uri ^ packageUri, Uri ^ partUri, System::String ^ fragment);

param.name: packageUri
param.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del objeto .

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the .

param.name: partUri
param.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del elemento del paquete.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the in the package.

param.name: fragment
param.span: Referencia "#" que identifica un elemento dentro de la parte del paquete.

span.span: A "#" reference identifying an element within the package part.

summary.span: Crea un Pack URI, dados un elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de , el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de una parte del paquete y un fragmento "#" que se anexará.

span.span: Creates a pack URI given a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package, and a "#" fragment to append.

returns.span: URI de paquete que identifica el paquete especificado, la parte del paquete y el fragmento.

span.span: The pack URI that identifies the specified package, package part, and fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` no se puede especificar como `null` o está vacío.`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. Si `partUri` es `null`, el URI de paquete devuelto apunta al paquete.If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. `fragment` no puede ser una cadena vacía, pero se puede especificar como `null`.`fragment` cannot be an empty string but can be specified as `null`. Cuando no se especifica como `null`, el `fragment` cadena debe comenzar con un carácter '#'.When not specified as `null`, the `fragment` string must begin with a '#' character. Para obtener más información de la sintaxis de `fragment` referencias, consulte la sección 3.5 "Fragment" de [RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt).For more information of the syntax of `fragment` references, see Section 3.5 "Fragment" of [RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt). En la tabla siguiente se muestra casos de ejemplo para el método.The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|Pack URI devueltoReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summarypack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xrefpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| Crear un URI de paquete es un proceso de varios pasos.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. Por ejemplo, es un paso en la creación de un pack URI reemplazar los caracteres de barra diagonal (/) de la `packageUri` con comas (,).For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). Para obtener más información sobre la conversión de cadena y cómo se forman pack URI, vea el apéndice A.4 "String Conversion Examples" y el apéndice B.3 "Redactar un Pack URI" en la especificación de Open Packaging Conventions disponible para su descarga en [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el método para definir un pack URI que hace referencia a un paquete.The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri CreatePartUri (Uri partUri);

Public Shared Function CreatePartUri (partUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ CreatePartUri(Uri ^ partUri);

param.name: partUri
param.span: URI de la parte del paquete.

span.span: The URI of the within the package.

summary.span: Crea un URI de parte de paquete con formato.

span.span: Creates a formatted URI.
A formatted URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de un siempre se hace referencia desde el raíz.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a is always referenced from the root. El valor devuelto URI es una ruta de acceso absoluta que siempre empieza por "/" y se ajusta a la sintaxis definida en la [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).The returned URI is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). En la tabla siguiente se muestra casos de ejemplo de .The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`partUri`|URI de parte devueltoReturned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |imagen1.jpgpicture1.jpg|/Picture1.jpg/picture1.jpg| |/Picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg|/Picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg| |a/mydoc.xamla/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml|/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml| ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el método para definir los identificadores URI relativos elementos.The following example shows how to use the method to define relative URIs for elements. [!code-csharp[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/CSharp/PackageWrite.cs#packagewritecreateparturi)] [!code-vb[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/visualbasic/packagewrite.vb#packagewritecreateparturi)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks En la tabla siguiente se muestra casos de ejemplo de .The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packUri`|URI de paquete devueltoReturned Package URI| |---------------|--------------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.xyz| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?mypackage| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpgpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|

Public Shared Function GetPartUri (packUri As Uri) As Uri

param.name: packUri
param.span: Pack URI desde el que se va a devolver el URI de .

summary.span: Devuelve el URI de un elemento dentro de un URI de paquete especificado.

returns.span: El URI de en el especificado, o si señala un paquete en lugar de .

span.span: The URI of the in the given , or if points to a package instead of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks El valor devuelto URI es relativa a la raíz del paquete y es una ruta de acceso absoluta que siempre empieza por "/" y se ajusta a la sintaxis definida en la [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).The returned URI is relative to the package root and is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). En la tabla siguiente se muestra casos de ejemplo de .The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packUri`|URI de parte devueltoReturned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|nulonull| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpgpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg/a/picture.jpg| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` debe identificar en el ("/") o un que no es un parte.`partUri` must identify either the ("/") or a that is not a part. Para obtener más información acerca de partes, vea la sección 9.3 "Relaciones" en Open Packaging Conventions Specification, disponible para su descarga en [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).For more information about parts, see Section 9.3 "Relationships" in the Open Packaging Conventions Specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples [Identificadores URI de paquete en WPFPack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md) [Especificación Open Packaging ConventionsOpen Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)

summary.span: Devuelve el de la parte de con el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] especificado.

span.span: Returns the from the with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

returns.span: El de la parte de paquete a partir de la relación con el especificado.

span.span: The of the from the relationship with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks El propiedad de una parte de relación debe identificar en el ("/") o un que no es un .The property of a relationship part must identify either the ("/") or a that is not a . Por ejemplo, si el elemento del paquete "/ /Files/Document.XAML" es el propietario del origen de la parte de la relación "/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", una llamada a con el `relationshipPartUri` parámetro de "/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" devuelve el de "/ /Files/Document.XAML".For example, if the package part "/files/document.xaml" is the source owner of the relationship part "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", calling with the `relationshipPartUri` parameter of "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" returns the of "/files/document.xaml".

-or-

span.span: The of the relationship part references another relationship part (not valid).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri ResolvePartUri (Uri sourcePartUri, Uri targetUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri ResolvePartUri(class System.Uri sourcePartUri, class System.Uri targetUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function ResolvePartUri (sourcePartUri As Uri, targetUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ ResolvePartUri(Uri ^ sourcePartUri, Uri ^ targetUri);

param.name: sourcePartUri
param.span: URI de la parte de origen o "/" para designar la raíz del paquete .

span.span: The URI of the source part, or "/" to designate the root.

param.name: targetUri
param.span: URI relativo a la parte de destino.

span.span: The relative URI to the target part.

summary.span: Devuelve un URI de parte de paquete, dados un URI de parte de origen y un URI con una ruta de acceso relativa a una parte de paquete de destino.

span.span: Returns a part URI given a source part URI and a URI with a relative path to a target part.

returns.span: El URI de la parte de destino resuelto entre los parámetros y especificados.

span.span: The URI of the target part resolved between the specified and the parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks En la tabla siguiente se muestra casos de ejemplo de .The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`sourcePartUri`|`targetUri`|URI devueltoReturned URI| |---------------------|-----------------|------------------| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|"imagen.jpg"picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|images/picture.jpgimages/picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/images/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/images/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|./picture.jpg./picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../picture.jpg../picture.jpg|/mydoc/picture.jpg/mydoc/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../images/picture.jpg../images/picture.jpg|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg/mydoc/images/picture.jpg| |/|images/picture.jpgimages/picture.jpg|/images/picture.jpg/images/picture.jpg| ## Examples En el siguiente ejemplo, se muestra cómo utilizar el método .The following example shows how to use the method. Para obtener un ejemplo completo, vea [leer un ejemplo de paquete](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160034).For the complete sample, see [Reading a Package Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160034).
